headline.print_headline: Boston Bans 'Synthetic Marijuana' in Face of Rising Health Toll
headline.main: Boston Bans 'Synthetic Marijuana' in Face of Rising Health Toll

docs.lead_paragraph: Boston on Friday banned the use, sale or purchase of a new class of drugs known as "synthetic marijuana," which has been linked to a nationwide rise in poisonings and overdose deaths.
docs.snippet: Boston on Friday banned the use, sale or purchase of a new class of drugs known as "synthetic marijuana," which has been linked to a nationwide rise in poisonings and overdose deaths.

headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola Funds Effort to Alter Obesity Battle
headline.main: Coca-Cola Funds Scientists Who Shift Blame for Obesity Away From Bad Diets

docs.abstract: The company supports a new nonprofit, the Global Energy Balance Network, that promotes a “science-based” approach to weight control: Get more exercise and worry less about cutting calories.
docs.snippet: The company supports a new nonprofit, the Global Energy Balance Network, that promotes a “science-based” approach to weight control: Get more exercise and worry less about cutting calories.

headline.print_headline: NYC Sees Surge in Synthetic Pot Use, With Dire Consequences
headline.main: NYC Sees Surge in Synthetic Pot Use, With Dire Consequences

docs.lead_paragraph: Ignoring the police officers standing down the block and the disingenuous fine print on the foil packet peeking out of his front pocket — "Warning: Don't Smoke" — a homeless man openly lit up a synthetic marijuana joint and explained why it's not like the real thing.
docs.snippet: Ignoring the police officers standing down the block and the disingenuous fine print on the foil packet peeking out of his front pocket — "Warning: Don't Smoke" — a homeless man openly lit up a synthetic marijuana joint and explained why...
